result.eng: I was on holiday in Connemara.
result.ga: bhí mé ar saoire i gconamara
result.orig: bhí mé ar saoire i gconamara
result.html: bhí mé ar saoire i gconamaraI was on holiday in Connemara.
result.ponchtml: ḃí mé ar saoire i gconamaraI was on holiday in Connemara.

result.eng: He left Connemara and took to London.
result.ga: d'fhág sé conamara agus thug londain air féin
result.orig: d'fhág sé conamara agus thug londain air féin
result.html: d'fhág sé conamara agus thug londain air féinHe left Connemara and took to London.
result.ponchtml: d'ḟág sé conamara agus ṫug londain air féinHe left Connemara and took to London.

result.eng: She is from Connemara by birth.
result.ga: is as conamara ó dhúchas í
result.orig: is as conamara ó dhúchas í
result.html: is as conamara ó dhúchas íShe is from Connemara by birth.
result.ponchtml: is as conamara ó ḋúċas íShe is from Connemara by birth.

result.eng: Seán has a house in Connemara.
result.ga: tá teach ag seán i gconamara
result.orig: tá teach ag seán i gconamara
result.html: tá teach ag seán i gconamaraSeán has a house in Connemara.
result.ponchtml: tá teaċ ag seán i gconamaraSeán has a house in Connemara.

result.eng: Your Irish has a Connemara accent.
result.ga: tá blas chonamara ar do chuid gaeilge
result.orig: tá blas chonamara ar do chuid gaeilge
result.html: tá blas chonamara ar do chuid gaeilgeYour Irish has a Connemara accent.
result.ponchtml: tá blas ċonamara ar do ċuid gaeilgeYour Irish has a Connemara accent.

result.eng: You can drive to plenty of places in Connemara without spending more than an hour on the road.
result.ga: is féidir leat tiomáint go neart áiteanna in gconamara gan níos mó ná uair a chloig a chaitheamh ar an mbóthar
result.orig: is féidir leat tiomáint go neart áiteanna in gconamara gan níos mó ná uair a chloig a chaitheamh ar an mbóthar
result.html: is féidir leat tiomáint go neart áiteanna in gconamara gan níos mó ná uair a chloig a chaitheamh ar an mbótharYou can drive to plenty of places in Connemara without spending more than an hour on the road.
result.ponchtml: is féidir leat tiomáint go neart áiteanna in gconamara gan níos mó ná uair a ċloig a ċaiṫeaṁ ar an mbóṫarYou can drive to plenty of places in Connemara without spending more than an hour on the road.
